physicalTable.name: SAMP_REVENUE_F
physicalTable.description: Reveue Fact table: Stores the fact information at the lowest grain.

physicalColumns.name: Prod_Key
physicalColumns.description: Product Key: Joins to Prod_Key of Products dimension table.

physicalColumns.name: Cost_Variable
physicalColumns.description: Revenue: Stores revenue information as a double.

physicalColumns.name: Order_Status
physicalColumns.description: Order Status: Stores order status values like '1-Booked','2-Fulfilled' and so on.

physicalColumns.name: Revenue
physicalColumns.description: Revenue: Stores revenue information as a double.

physicalColumns.name: Bill_Mth_Key
physicalColumns.description: Bill Month Key: Joins to Mth_Key of Time dimension table (Mth grain).

physicalColumns.name: Bill_Day_Dt
physicalColumns.description: Bill Day Date: Joins to Calendar_date of Time dimension table (Day grain).

physicalColumns.name: Order_Day_Dt
physicalColumns.description: Order Day Date: Stores the information in date format.

physicalColumns.name: Units
physicalColumns.description: Units: Stores units information as an integer.

physicalColumns.name: Paid_Day_Dt
physicalColumns.description: Paid Day Date: Stores the information in date format.

physicalColumns.name: Discnt_Value
physicalColumns.description: Discount Value: Stores discount value as a double.

physicalColumns.name: Order_Key
physicalColumns.description: Order Number: Uniquely identifies each record in the fact table.

physicalColumns.name: Cust_Key
physicalColumns.description: Customer Key: Joins to Cust_Key column of Customers dimension table.

physicalColumns.name: Bill_Qtr_Key
physicalColumns.description: Bill Quarter Key: Joins to Qtr_Key of Time dimension table (Qtr grain).

physicalColumns.name: ORDER_DTIME1_DB_TZ
physicalColumns.description: Order Day Date: Stores the information in Timestamp format.

physicalColumns.name: Order_Type
physicalColumns.description: Order Type:Stores order type value like 'Secure','Express' and so on.

physicalColumns.name: Office_Key
physicalColumns.description: Office Key: Joins to Office_Key of Employees dimension table.

physicalColumns.name: Shipto_Addr_Key
physicalColumns.description: Shipto Address Key: Joins to Address_Key column of Addresses dimension table.

physicalColumns.name: Discnt_Rate
physicalColumns.description: Discount Rate: Stores discount rate as an integer.

physicalColumns.name: Empl_Key
physicalColumns.description: Employee Key: Joins to Empl_Key column of Employees dimension table.

physicalColumns.name: Cost_Fixed
physicalColumns.description: Revenue: Stores revenue information as a double.

physicalColumns.name: Currency
physicalColumns.description: Currency: Stores currency information like AUD, USD, EUR..
